My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based of a practiced formula to get the result that i am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

We get an idea of what we are gona work with. Some details and a good perspective of what's to come

2

Brainstorming & Concept

we will think of innovative ideas, cool concepts and awsome designs that will suit your needs

3

UI/UX Planing

We will figure out what's the best for the the target audiance you want to reach and plan out the layout

4

Interaction

Include interactive components in site to add engagment of the user
